content: संधानं {@--1@} Joining, uniting. {@--2@} Union, junction, combination; यदर्धे विच्छिन्नं भवति कृतसंधानमिव तत् <ls>Ś. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 101.</ls> {@--3@} Mixing, compounding (of medicines &c.). {@--4@} Restoration, repairing. {@--5@} Fitting, taking an aim, fixing (as an arrow to the bow-string); तत्साधुकृतसंधानं प्रतिसंहर सायकं <ls>Ś. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 8.</ls> {@--6@} Alliance, league, friendship, peace; मृद्घटवत्सुखभेद्यो दुःसंधानश्च दुर्जनो भवति <ls>H. 1. 92</ls> (where it has sense 1 also). {@--7@} A joint; पादजंघयोः संधाने गुल्फः <ls>Suśr.</ls> {@--8@} Attention. {@--9@} Direction. {@--10@} Supporting. {@--11@} Distillation (of liquors). {@--12@} Spirituous liquor or a kind of it. {@--13@} A kind of relish eaten to excite thirst. {@--14@} Preparation of pickles. {@--15@} Contraction of the skin by means of astringents. {@--16@} Sour rice-gruel. {@--17@} Bell-metal (सौराष्ट्र).
